model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
The garlic chicken sounds delicious. Can you make it? What kinds of spicy foods have you taught yourself to make?
Yes, it's one of my favorites! It always remind me of the good old days. Spicy foods are great for the kick they have...like spicy fried rice! You should come over and try it.
I would love to, I enjoy cooking so maybe you can teach me to make it, too?
Yeah definitely! I know you like hot foods, so if you learn and can make them fresh it will taste amazing. Have you tried any new foods lately?
Not any new foods, but I did try a new food truck near me that was delicious! It was street tacos and you could pick from barbacoa, chicken, and steak for the protein. Do you like Mexican food? 
Oh god I do love Mexican food. That was be so hard to pick because they're all so good! Did they have al pastor by any chance? I loved marinated pork tacos.
unfortunately no, but I can ask them if they plan to get it in the future. I had one of each and they were all good in their own way. Have you ever had Birra tacos? I'd love to try those next.
I've never had birra tacos, what are those? They sound intriguing.
If I understand it correctly, the tortilla is dipped in the liquid from the braised meat, and then fried on a flat top. Then filled with the meat that was braised and other toppings that you like. I'll let you know if I find a place that serves these tacos in our area!
Wow, my mouth is watering. I'll definitely have to try that. It sounds amazing and might be a new favorite. Is it spicy?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Cooking and Meals', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A enjoyed a steak dinner and likes cooking various dishes. Speaker B cooked chicken strips with fries and mashed potatoes. They share their favorite meals.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: I decided to have a steak for dinner last night, thanks to you! ### Speaker B: That's great! I was thinking about making a steak tonight too. How was yours? Who'd you eat with? ### Speaker A: I ate with my father. It was very juicy and tender! What did you have to eat last night? ### Speaker B: I had some chicken strips with fries and mashed potatoes. It was pretty great! I cooked most of it myself. Do you like to cook? ### Speaker A: I enjoy cooking. It takes my mind off things and helps with stress quite a bit. I had fried potatoes with the steak. Shrimp, too. It really was a lovely meal. Thanks for the idea! What about you? Do you like cooking?' }
```
